LanguageData.AS_Handgun.label: AS Handgun
LanguageData.AS_Handgun.description: A handgun crafted from an ancient technique. It has a long barrel, a sense of stability when shooting, and a design that is easy to handle.
LanguageData.AS_Handgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_Handgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.label: AS Assault Rifle
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.description: An assault rifle crafted from an ancient technology. A grip is attached to improve the accuracy and stability of shooting at close to medium range.
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_AssaultRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.label: AS Sniper Rifle
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.description: Custom version of the AS assault rifle. The nozzle is extended and a scope is attached, making it specialized for shooting at longer distances.
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_SniperRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.label: AS Shotgun
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.description: A shotgun crafted from an ancient technology. The barrel is long, but the weight is light and it is easy to handle in close quarters. Accuracy is also high overall, and it is very reliable in close combat to close range.
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_Shotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.label: Grawehr
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.description: A rifle that shoots high-explosive projectiles at high speed. Creates a small explosion at the point of impact, dealing damage to the opponent.
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_Grawehr.tools.1.label: barrel
